text: Belle Smith Wheelan (born October 10, 1951) is an American educator who served as Virginia Secretary of Education under Governor Mark Warner. She is currently the President and Chief Executive Officer of the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools' Commission on Colleges. ==References== ==External links== * Virginia Secretary of Education Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:State cabinet secretaries of Virginia Category:Women in Virginia politics Category:African-American people in Virginia politics Category:African-American women in politics Category:Louisiana State University alumni Category:Trinity University (Texas) alumni Category:University of Texas at Austin alumni Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:American women chief executives Category:American chief executives of education-related organizations
title: Belle Wheelan
